purpose: To provide a high-performance, scalable database solution for time-series data, particularly in Industrial IoT applications.
principle: TDengine works by optimizing storage and query performance for time-series data, using a unique architecture that supports fast data ingestion and retrieval.
reusability: Offers a SQL-like interface and supports integration with various data visualization and analysis tools, making it adaptable for different use cases.
limitations: Primarily focused on time-series data, which may not be suitable for other types of data storage needs.
name: TDengine
description: High-performance, scalable time-series database designed for Industrial IoT (IIoT) scenarios
highlight: Designed specifically for high-performance and scalable time-series data management in Industrial IoT scenarios.
